metadata.name: Hidden Local User Creation
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a local hidden user account which should not happen for event ID 4720.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND metadata.event_code = 4720 AND endswith(lower(user_result.name), lower('$')) AND NOT lower(user_result.name) = lower('homegroupuser$'))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a local hidden user account which should not happen for event ID 4720.
